abstract.t: BMP Loc-RIB [RFC9069] enforces that the BMP router sets the Peer Address value of a VPN route information to zero, and sets the Peer Distinguisher value of a VPN route information to the route distinguisher or unique locally defined value of the particular instance the Loc-RIB belongs to. This document introduces the option to communicate the Remote VRF Information from which a VPN route was received when reporting that VPN route information with BMP Loc-RIB.
